short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks brands that give you discounts. When You Shop. You Save. Charities and Causes Win.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make a difference and give to your favorite charity using affiliate commissions. With Sponsor Circle's Shop for Good program, you can feel good while you shop. 

What if I told youâ€¦you could create an impact even as you did your online shopping. Sponsor Circle affiliates makes this easy. 

Be a part of a win-win situation where you enjoy great deals and, at the same time, create a ripple of positive change in the world. 

Shop for Good.

Purchase an eligible product and the store you purchased from will send us affiliate commissions which we then send 100% of - to a charity of your choice. 

Sponsor Circle may get paid commissions directly from companies and/or via affiliate programs on sites visited and/or products purchased while using this browser extension.  These commissions/affiliate-payments become the donations that go to your selected charity.

It is that simple!

To get started, download the extension, register and verify your account. From there select your favourite charity and get shopping!

Make a difference today!

*** Big earnings and discounts for you.  The best coupons, applied automatically. 

 *** No additional costs to you, no credit card:  This is NOT a top up or round up request. Funds come directly from the merchant. 

 *** No additional information required:  All we ask for is your name, email address and he charity of your choice and we can do the rest. 

 *** Empower your passion: Whether it's education, environment, health, or any cause close to your heart, Sponsor Circle lets you support it without any extra effort or cost on your part. Let your purchases have purpose!  

By using this browser extension, you agree to the Sponsor Circle Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

We build a range of services that help millions of people daily to explore and interact with the world in new ways including Sponsor Circle apps, Google maps, chrome extensions and sites. 

Privacy Policy: https://sponsorcircle.com/privacy-policy/
Cookie Policy: https://sponsorcircle.com/privacy-policy/
 

Disclaimer:
This Platform and extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout.
